meanings.definition: Of or relating to a material that can be easily molded or shaped.
meanings.sent1: The euplastic clay was perfect for making different figures in art class.
meanings.sent2: The artist used euplastic material to create a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The euplastic putty bounced around like a playful puppy.
meanings.sent4: Her euplastic mind could adapt to any situation effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The euplastic nature of the fabric allowed it to take on various forms with ease.

meanings.definition: Capable of being formed or molded into different shapes.
meanings.sent1: With euplastic playdough, children can create endless shapes and designs.
meanings.sent2: The toy blocks were euplastic, allowing kids to build unique structures.
meanings.sent3: The euplastic balloon twisted into a funny animal shape at the party.
meanings.sent4: His euplastic imagination could envision countless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The euplastic rubber band stretched and contorted into various shapes effortlessly.

meanings.definition: Having the ability to change or adapt easily.
meanings.sent1: The euplastic team quickly adjusted their strategy during the game.
meanings.sent2: She showed her euplastic nature by smoothly transitioning between tasks.
meanings.sent3: The euplastic chameleon changed colors to match its surroundings in a comical way.
meanings.sent4: His euplastic personality allowed him to fit in anywhere like a chameleon.
meanings.sent5: The euplastic tree branches swayed gracefully in the wind, adapting to every breeze.
